title: Healthcare Enterprise Account Executive, Major Accounts
summary: The US Healthcare team at Apple aims to deliver health focused benefits to end-customers and help enterprise businesses transform the way people work.
description: In this role you will: Advise on transformational solutions with our partners in Healthcare (hospital systems) for Apple’s Enterprise Major Accounts. Develop account plans aligned with our customers’ strategies, assess their progress and guide them on the journey of transformation to mobility, while growing adoption of the Apple ecosystem. Effectively complete plans by cross-functionally partnering with Systems Engineers, Inside Sales, reseller and strategic partners. Build demand generation activities, identify new opportunities, accurately forecast, and coordinate fulfillment logistics.
key_qualifications: Proven consultative selling experience in business transformation solutions for large enterprises, familiar with healthcare hospital systems, experienced in maintaining C-level relationships, and strong in relationship development, management, deal making, and negotiations.
preferred_qualifications: Brings highest level of integrity, contributes to team strength, subject matter expert in healthcare hospital systems, exceptional at presenting and remains calm under pressure, understands customer needs deeply and exceeds their expectations.
